Microsoft's Server and Tools Business- in many ways the epicentre of its cloud strategy- is primed to undergo a shakeup this year with the departure of long-time division president Bob Muglia. While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer wrote in a January 10 email to employees announcing Muglia's removal. "We are now ready to build on our success and move forward into the era of cloud computing."
